title: Tinted Face & Body Lotion SPF 30 – Medium Beige
desc: Protect Your Skin Naturally — With a Beautiful, Healthy Glow. This isn’t just another sunscreen lotion — it’s a clean, natural skincare essential designed for people who want real protection without harmful chemicals. Crafted with your skin and wellbeing in mind, this tinted SPF 30 lotion blends powerful sun defense with nourishing natural oils for everyday radiance. Broad‑spectrum SPF 30 protection powered by high‑micron zinc oxide. Naturally tinted to flatter your skin tone while minimizing white cast. Hydrates with cold‑pressed jojoba and olive oils. Free from oxybenzone, octinoxate, parabens, phthalates, synthetic fragrances, and GMOs. Cruelty‑free, vegan, and made in the USA.
alt: Tinted Face & Body Lotion SPF 30 – Medium Beige
